name.ch: 機器學習與主動式影像處理

department.ch: 遙測科技碩士學位學程
department.en: Master of Science Program in Remote Sensing Science and Technology

goal.ch: In this course, some feature extraction methods will be introduced, such as Principle Component Analysis, Linear Discriminant Analysis. Then, the detailed principles about the back propagation neural networks will be introduced. And,please note that we have to implement a lot of algorithms mentioned above by Matlab. Therefore, students without any programming background and skills, please do not take this course.
goal.en: “In this course, some feature extraction methods will be introduced, such as Principle Component Analysis, Linear Discriminant Analysis. Then, the detailed principles about the back propagation neural networks will be introduced. And,please note that we have to implement many algorithms mentioned above by Matlab. Therefore, students without any programming background and skills, please do not take this course.“

outline.ch:
This course is based on learning by programming and coding, therefore, students without programming background and skills, do not take this course.
1. Perceptron
2. Back Propagation Neural Networks.
3. Information Theory - Entropy
4. Principle Component Analysis
5. Linear Discriminant Analysis
All algorithms mentioned above will be implemented by Matlab
outline.en:
“This course is based on learning by programming and coding, therefore, students without programming background and skills, do not take this course.
1. Perceptron
2. Back Propagation Neural Networks.
3. Information Theory - Entropy
4. Principle Component Analysis
5. Linear Discriminant Analysis
All algorithms mentioned above will be implemented by Matlab“

textbook.ch: “Neural Network Design (2nd Edition) (Hagan, Demuth, Beale, De Jesus) ISBN：9780971732117“
textbook.en: “Neural Network Design (2nd Edition) (Hagan, Demuth, Beale, De Jesus) ISBN：9780971732117“

gradMethod.ch:
50％ midterm project 

50％ final project

Roll call at irregular times, and those who is found not present will have their total score deducted by 5 points each time.
gradMethod.en:
50％ midterm project 

50％ final project

Roll call at irregular times, and those who is found not present will have their total score deducted by 5 points each time.

ch.competencies: 遙測與空間資訊專業能力

en.competencies: Professional competence in remote sensing and geoinformatics
